name: Sarah Vaughan
description: '''Sarah Lois Vaughan''' ({{IPAc-en|v|ɔː|n|}},  March 27, 1924 – April 3, 1990) was an American [[jazz]] singer and pianist. Nicknamed "Sassy" and "[[List of nicknames of jazz musicians|The Divine One]]", she won two [[Grammy Awards]], including the Lifetime Achievement Award, and was nominated for a total of nine Grammy Awards. She was given an [[NEA Jazz Masters]] Award in 1989. Critic [[Scott Yanow]] wrote that she had "one of the most wondrous voices of the 20th century".
